Name: Grass Cutters Academy - Idle Game
About the game: Are you interested in gardening? painting? how about a mix of both? In Grass Cutters Academy you cut grass for money, spend that money on paint powered auto mowers that get faster, stronger and more efficient ★ IDLE OR ACTIVE? You can play Grass Cutters Academy actively or via the use of auto mowers which will do the works for you as they cut and paint your gardens ★ PAINT YOUR GARDENS 10 different dyes to collect and create some abstract artwork as you cut your gardens ★ COLLECT PETS 6 snails to collect each unlocking unique buffs, collect transmogs for your pets that make them look like bees, scorpions and snakes ★ BLING YOUR MOWER 12 different flairs to collect and bling out your Lawnmowers, from flame trails to star bursts ★ CRAFT POWERFUL GEAR Use the materials you find to craft powerful new equipment and cosmetics ★ TURF WARS Go head to head against the AI in a garden painting competition, dye more grass than your opposition to show them who the true gardener is! ★ ACHIEVEMENTS! 74 achievements for you to unlock!
